negotiator.xml

Class XmlWriteStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.xml.XmlWriteStream

  • public class XmlWriteStream
extends java.lang.Object
    a xml stream that can write Maps

    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlWriteStream

        public XmlWriteStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                      java.lang.String topLabel)
               throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream
        topLabel - the top level element name, typically "Tournament" or "Session"
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(java.lang.String name,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> data)
           throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        write data to xml file
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the element to write.
        data - a xml map of key-value pairs. The hashmap is written as a full element. Then each pair is checked. If the value is a Map, we call write recursively. Otherwise, we convert the key and value to String and write that element as an attribute. To improve layout, the hashmap's string values are written first. If you want to have multiple keys that look identical, use a Key as key.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the stream. After this you should dispose the XmlWriteStream as calls to write and close will fail.

      • flush

        public void flush()
           throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
